name: ChristmasCalendar
0:
”Alexa, open christmas calendar”
”Alexa, start christmas calendar”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas calendar
des:
Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until Christmas/events related to Christmas. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific event.
Release notes:
- First in the skill collection of Uniquely's Holiday Skills
- Use this skill to count down with your family and friends
- Updated every day until Christmas
Next in the Uniquely's Holiday Skills pack:
---------------- Holiday Countdown -----------------
Note: This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
